title: Executive Order 8475-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 924 of August 8, 1908, Establishing the Klamath Lake Reservation
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, Executive Order No. 924 of August 8, 1908, establishing the Klamath Lake Reservation, in Siskiyou County, California, and Klamath County, Oregon, is hereby revoked as to the following-described lands in Klamath County, Oregon:
T. 40 S., R. 9 E., sec. 28, lot 5, comprising 7.80 acres, more or less.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8475-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 924 of August 8, 1908, Establishing the Klamath Lake Reservation Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371995
